title: Restore full health-check command to standard/ template
description: Copy and adapt the archived health-check.md to standard/.claude/commands/health-check.md. Include all features from the archived version: task JSON schema validation, relationship integrity, ID safety, overview consistency, status rules, difficulty ranges, semantic validation (stale tasks, owner mismatch, orphan deps, workflow diagram staleness), and full CLAUDE.md audit. Update references to match standard/ structure (e.g., reference file paths).
completion_notes: Created standard/.claude/commands/health-check.md (~250 lines) with full feature set from archived version. Includes all lite features plus: semantic validation (stale 'In Progress' detection, owner-capability mismatch, orphan dependencies), workflow diagram staleness check, expanded auto-fix options for semantic issues. Updated standard/CLAUDE.md to include /health-check in commands list. Updated reference paths to match standard/ structure.
notes: Standard version is ~250 lines vs lite's ~140 lines. Added semantic validation section for large projects (20+ tasks) including stale task detection, owner mismatch checking, and workflow diagram staleness.

assumptions.description: Standard template warrants full semantic validation
assumptions.validation_method: Reviewed standard template scope - full workflow with agents designed for complex projects

decision_rationale: Standard template includes full Spec→Plan→Execute→Verify workflow with multiple agents, designed for complex projects that can easily reach 20+ tasks. Full semantic validation is appropriate and valuable here.
